DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacologic Study of CYC065, a Cyclin Dependent Kinase Inhibitor, in Patients With Advanced Cancers
DOC.detailed_description: This is an open-label, single arm, dose escalation study in patients with advanced cancers. Treatment will be administered on an outpatient basis.
